Title: Chaos
Writer: Michelle King (created by), Robert King (created by), Phil Alden Robinson (created by), Michelle King, Robert King, Joey Hartstone (executive story editor), Joey Scavuzzo (staff writer), Ryan Pedersen (staff writer), Tegan Shohet (staff writer)
Actors: Christine Baranski, Rose Leslie, Erica Tazel, Sarah Steele
Plot: Diane takes on a new client who is accused of cyber-terrorism; an accident brings Diane and Kurt together; Henry reveals new truths about the scandal to Maia.
